title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, push, and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui). Features themes, model manager, RAG, voice.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, embeddings and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete and stream responses.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with shell completions and pretty JSON output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds local AI autocomplete powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming, chat, embeddings and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with CUDA, ROCm and CPU-only variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Alpaca, WizardCoder, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama with system-tray and markdown chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app for retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript SDK.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python SDK.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model sharing and troubleshooting.
